top.title: Ukraine says 'understanding' reached on US peace plan, as Trump envoy to meet Putin
top.summary: Kyiv and Washington have moved closer to agreeing the shape of a deal to end the fighting, with Putin to be consulted next week.

top.title: Italian parliament unanimously votes to make femicide a crime
top.summary: The gender-motivated murder of a woman will now be covered by a distinct clause in Italian law - punishable by a life sentence.

top.title: Russian mercenaries accused of cold-blooded killings in Mali - BBC speaks to eyewitnesses
top.summary: Refugees have given the BBC a harrowing account of atrocities committed by the Russian paramilitary force.

top.title: Ofcom vows to name and shame platforms over online sexism
top.summary: But critics say the regulator's new measures need to be the law rather than guidelines to make the internet safer for women and girls.

top.title: Cryptology firm cancels elections after losing encryption key
top.summary: The International Association for Cryptologic Research - created to study secure communication - said it was an "honest human mistake."

top.title: Scammers hacked her phone and stole thousands - so how did they get her details?
top.summary: Sue Shore told the BBC how scammers targeted her - and we found her information had been leaked online.

title.#text: Qualcomm reveals its not-so-elite Snapdragon 8 Gen 5
Campbell’s promises its soups are not made with 3D printed meat
House overhauls KOSA in a new kids online safety package
